titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Jean-Claude de Bremaecker manuscript of "Geophysics: The Earth's Interior" MS 396

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-01 21:56:12 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: Jean-Claude de Bremaecker manuscript of "Geophysics: The Earth's Interior"
did.abstract: This collection contains the manuscript entitled "Geophysics: The Earth's Interior" by Jean-Claude de Bremaecker. De Bremaecker is a Professor Emeritus of Geology at Rice University.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Jean-Claude de Bremaecker earned his Master's of Science degree from Louisiana State University in 1950, and his Ph.D. from UC, Berkeley in 1952. He is currently a Professor Emeritus of Geology at Rice University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the manuscript entitled Geophysics: The Earth's Interior by Jean-Claude de Bremaecker. De Bremaecker is a Professor Emeritus of Geology at Rice.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research. Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the de Bremaecker Manuscript must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This collection was donated to Fondren Library by Jean-Claude de Bremaecker on November 12, 1985.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jean-Claude de Bremaecker, 1985, MS 396 Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University

did.unittitle: Jean-Claude de Bremaecker Manuscript "Geophysics: The Earth's Interior"
